sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Built from scavenged blaster parts and the occasional piece from a repulsorlift generator, the bowcaster accelerator enhancement is the second-most common modification to Wookiee bowcasters after the automatic re-cocker. Essentially an upgrade of the weapon's bolt accelerators, this attachment allows the bowcaster to fire its highly destructive quarrels with more force than typical in a stock weapon. These attachments are only for use on Wookiee bowcasters, and they cannot be purchased; they must be built either by the owner of the bowcaster with an Average (2 difficulty dice) Mechanics check or the weaponsmith who built the weapon for him. Models Include: None. Base Modifiers: Increase weapon damage by one point. Modification Options: 2 Damage + 1 Mods, 2 Weapon Quality (Pierce + 1) Mods.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>1</hp_required> <name>Bowcaster Accelerator Enhancement</name> <number>GEAR0001143</number> <price>250</price> <range/> <rarity>4</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-18 19:27:34</sys_created_on> <sys_id>047cbd792face890e0f497eef699b63a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-18 19:27:34</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
